data.text: Nnjasha ya ku Epesho ila ikapumuleje a Pauli gubhaashemilenje bhakilishitu, gubhaatajilenje ntima. Kungai gubhaalajilenje, gubhajabhwile kwenda ku Makedonia.
Gubhapitile mmbali ya yene ilambo ila bhalikwaataganga ntima bhandunji kwa malobhe gamagwinji. Kungai gubhaishe ku Giliki,
Kweneko gubhatemi myei jitatu. Bhalipanganika kwenda ku Shilia, gubhang'amwile kuti Bhayaudi bhatendaga kwaatamilanga itamo ya pinga kwaapoteka, kwa nneyo gubhabhujile kupitila ku Makedonia.

Gubhalongene na a Shopato bha ku Bhelea, bhana bhabho a Pailashi na a Lishitilako na a Shekundo bhandunji bha ku Teshalonike na a Gayo bhandu bha ku Debhe na a Timoteo na a Tikiko na a Tolopimo bhandunji bha ku Ashia.
Bhene bhanganyabho bhashinkutulongolelanga nikwenda kutulinda ku Toloa.
Jikapiteje shikukuu ja mikate jangataga ngedule, gutukwelile meli kujabhula ku Pilipi na lyubha lya nng'ano gutwaishilenje ku Toloa kula. Kweneko gututemi juma jimo.
Lyubha lya ndandubho lya juma gutuimene nkupinga kugabhana nkate. Pabha a Pauli bhashinkutumbilila kujabhula pa malabhi gakwe, gubhapundile kwaalungushiyanga na kukunguluka mpaka pakati shilo.
Yashinkupagwa kandili yaigwinji ilikolela mwene nkati golopa mutwaimene mula.

Nshanda jumo lina lyakwe Yutikashi ashinkutama pa lidilisha akuno a Pauli bhalipunda lunguya, Yutiko gwatandwibhe kugweela kashoko na kungai lugono lukuntopelaga, gwagwile pai kukopoka golopa ja tatu. Gubhannokotenje ali awile.
A Pauli gubhatulwishe pai, nikunnjapata gubhashite, “Nnakolanje lipamba pabha gumi gwakwe gwatangu.”
Gubhakwelile kabhili kugolopa, gubhagabhile nkate, gubhalile. Gubhapundile kukunguluka nabhonji mpaka kumashelo, gubhajabhwile.
Bhandunji bhala gubhampelekenje nshanda jula kumui ali jwankoto, guyaanonyelenje kwa kaje.
Gutukwelile meli gutulungolele kwenda ku Asho kweneko ni kutwatumbilile kwapashila a Pauli. Pabha bhashinkupinga kupitila kweneko kwa mpanda gwa pai.
Bhai, gubhatuimene ku Asho, gutwaapashole mmeli, gutupite ku Mitulene.
Tukajabhuleje penepo pa malabhi gakwe gutuishe ku Kio. Lyubha lya bhili gutujimishe meli ku Shamo na malabhi gakwe gutuishe ku Mileto.

A Pauli bhashinkutumbilila kupelenganya na mwanja gwangali kupitila ku Epesho, nkupinga bhanakabhiye ku Ashiako. Pabha bhashinkukola shanguya sha ika ku Yelushalemu itendekaga bhakashiimane shikukuu sha Pentekoshite.
A Pauli bhali ku Mileto, gubhatumile ntenga ku bhanangulungwa bha likanisha ku Epesho nkupinga bhaimane nabhonji.
Bhakaikanganeje kunngwabho, gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Mmanganyanji mmumanyinji shinjite tama mobha gowe kutandubhila lyubha linaishe ku Ashia.
Ngulikwaakamulila maengo Bhakulungwa kwa kwiitimalika kowe na kwa minyoi na malinjilo gambataga kwa itamo ya Bhayaudi ya pinga mboteka.
Mmumanyinji kuti ngakweteje nnjishi kunnungushiyanga palugwinjili na nnyumba yenunji na kunnjiganyanga indu ya kunnjangutilanga.
Natendaga kwaaleyanga bhowenji Bhayaudi na Bhagiliki bhaipetanje kwa a Nnungu na bhaakulupalilanje Bhakulungwa bhetu a Yeshu.”
“Bhai, nnaino mpilikananje! Kwa kunkunda Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo, nne ngunakwenda ku Yelushalemu akuno ngakumumanya gapinga mbata kweneko.
Ikabheje Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo anangong'ondela kuti mwilambo yowe itabho na mboteko inaninda.
Ikabheje, gumi gwangu ngakuubhona kubha shindu sha mmbone, ikabhe maliye mwanja na liengo libhambele Bhakulungwa a Yeshu nilitende, yani kukong'ondela Ngani ja Mmbone ja ntuka gwa a Nnungu.
“Na lelo, nnolanje, namwene nimumanyi kuti mmanganyanji mmowe ninnungushiyenje upalume gwa a Nnungu, ngulikwenda ako na koko, nkamonanga kabhili.
Kwa nneyo, lyubha lya lelo lino ngunakunkong'ondelanga kuti, jojowe shaobhejo nne nangali shoshowe sha gambwa.
Pabha nangaleka wala kashoko kunnungushiyanga yowe ibhatumbilile a Nnungu.”

“Mwiteiganje mwashaayene, nnishunganje likundilyo Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo ashikummikanga mmanganyanji mmanganje mmalelanga. Nnishunganje likundi lya bhandunji bha a Nnungu libhaliumile kwa minyai jika mwana gwabho.
Nimumanyi kuti nyabhulaga ashimaogo ga jogoya shibhannjiilanganilanje na bhakalibhonelanga shiya likundilyo.
Nkali kukopoka munkumbi gwenunji shibhakoposhelanje bhandunji shibhajiye bheleketanga ya puganya nkupinga bhabhanganje bhaajiganywa na bhaakulupalilanje bhene bhanganyabho.
Kwa nneyo ntamangananje shikupi lola nkumbushilanje kuti kwa yaka itatu, shilo na mui, ngatotoshelaga kunneya kila mundu kwa kunngutanjila.
“Bhai, nnaino ngunakummikanga muulinda gwa a Nnungu na kwa lilobhe lya ntuka gwabho, ukunshimilikanga ngunakumpanganga mboka pamo na bhandunji bhabho bhakonjeleywenje.
Nne nangalokolila mmbiya wala shaabhu, wala nngubho ika mundu jojowe.
Mwaashayenenji mmumanyinji kuti njikamula maengo kwa makono gangu, nkupinga mbate indu ipinjikwa, yangu na yashaajangunji.

Kwa indu yowe natendaga kunnangulanga kuti kwa kamula maengo nneyo tunaapinjikwa kwaajangutilanga bhakakwiikombolanga, akuno tulikumbushila malobhe ga Bhakulungwa a Yeshu bhayene shibhashite bheleketa, ‘Mbaya kulaguya, nngalingana na poshela.’ ”
Bhakamaliyeje kubheleketa genego, gubhatindibhelenje gubhajujilenje Nnungu.
Bhowenji bhatendaga gutanga, bhalikwaalajilanga na kwaajambatila a Pauli nnukoi.
Bhashinkuinjikanga kwa kaje kwa lilobhe libhabhelekete a Pauli kuti bhakaabhonanga kabhili. Bhai, gubhaapelesheyenje mpaka kumeli.
